mapper.select: select t.*,u.name userName from cure_symptom_and_condition t left join sys_user u on t.operator_id=u.id where t.fk_patient_id=#{patientId} order by t.update_time desc
select * from cure_symptom_and_condition where fk_patient_diagnosis_id=#{pdId} and is_enable=1
